document.full_text: gasoline prices in the united states rose 6.65 cents per gallon over a two-week period, carried by the rise in crude oil prices stemming from the turmoil in libya, an industry analyst said.
document.title: u.s. gasoline prices rise to $3.57/gallon: survey
lines_and_colors: gasoline prices in the united states rose 6.65 cents per gallon over a two-week period, carried by the rise in crude oil prices stemming from the turmoil in libya, an industry analyst said.
